extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: call_service_async
block.description: Call recipe Upsert NetSuite Payment (do not wait for response)

properties.label: Payment Internal ID
properties.name: payment_internal_id
properties.hint: if this is an update and you know the internal id, specify it here

properties.label: Payment Extenal ID
properties.name: payment_external_id
properties.hint: if specified, a matching payment with this external id will be updated.  If a match is not found, this external id will be used

block.comment: This is a credit card or bank account payment
See if this payment involves a Credit Memo (the payment method will be "Credit" instead of "Visa xxx" for example).
